videos.title: Using Thirdweb Edition Drop smart contract with DexAppBuilder
Tutorial | Deploy Thirdweb Edition Drop smart contract with DexAppBuilder

documentation.description: Edition Drop allows you to create multiple NFTs from the same asset using the ERC1155 standard.
Edition allows you to create multiple copies of the same NFT using the ERC1155 standard.
NFT Collection allows you to create unique NFTs on the ERC721 standard without the drop mechanism.

videos.title: Deploy and Use NFT Drop with DexAppBuilder

documentation.description: NFT Drop is ideal when you want to release a collection of unique NFTs using the ERC721A Standard.

videos.title: Managing Your ERC20 Token in DexAppBuilder

documentation.description: The Token contract is suited for creating a digital currency and is compliant with the ERC20 standard.

videos.title: Deploy and Use Token Drop with DexAppBuilder

documentation.description: Token Drop allows you to release ERC20 tokens that users can claim under specific conditions.
Token Airdrop allows you to distribute ERC20 tokens to multiple wallet addresses in a single transaction.
Pack allows you to bundle multiple tokens (ERC20, ERC721, ERC1155) together into a single NFT that can be opened.
Split allows you to distribute funds automatically between multiple recipients according to predefined percentages.
StakeERC721 allows users to stake their NFTs and earn ERC20 token rewards based on staking duration.
StakeERC20 allows users to stake their ERC20 tokens and earn rewards based on staking duration.
Multiwrap allows you to wrap multiple ERC20, ERC721, and ERC1155 tokens into a single NFT container.
NFT Airdrop allows you to distribute ERC721 NFTs to multiple wallet addresses in a single transaction.
Edition Airdrop allows you to distribute ERC1155 tokens to multiple wallet addresses in a single transaction.
Vote enables on-chain governance for your project with proposals that token holders can vote on.
A Marketplace is a contract where you can buy and sell NFTs, similar to platforms like OpenSea or Rarible.
DropAllowanceERC20 is an extended version of the Token Drop contract that allows users to set the ERC-20 token they want to sell using an allowance-based system.
